hero.name: Le Ba Hau
hero.description: Passionate about creating beautiful and functional web experiences with modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description: I'm a Frontend Developer with 1 year of experience in building modern web applications. I specialize in React ecosystem and love creating intuitive user interfaces with clean, maintainable code.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey
experience.projectDesc: A comprehensive management system for educational institutions, supporting operations between schools, teachers, and students.

responsibilities.admin: Developed Admin module: Built centralized data management modules (user management, courses, classes, and system permissions).
responsibilities.teacher: Developed Teacher module: Implemented business features such as attendance, lesson plan management, grading, and student progress tracking.
responsibilities.uiux: UI/UX Optimization: Used Ant Design combined with Tailwind CSS customization to build professional Dashboard interfaces.
responsibilities.state: State Management: Utilized React Query for server-side state management and Redux Toolkit for global application states.
responsibilities.collab: Collaboration: Worked closely with Backend team to align JSON data structures and integrate RESTful APIs effectively.

ems.title: Education Management System
ems.description: A comprehensive system for educational institutions with admin and teacher modules, attendance tracking, and grade management.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React, TypeScript, and Framer Motion for smooth animations.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
